name: Immune System TD BETA
description:
Deploy an army of white blood cells to defend your body from an invasion of viruses and bacteria. A scientifically accurate tower defense game about the immune system, developed by Julie Bodette.

This is the old version! Go here for the most updated version of this game:

https://julie-bodette.itch.io/immune-system-td

Check out the other games from OUGDA on our website and support Ohio University game development!

http://ohiougda.weebly.com
